segments.text: Oh my, look at those kids trying to get cookies from the jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is standing on that wobbly stool, reaching up as high as he can.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I'm surprised the stool hasn't tipped over yet with the way it's tilted.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just standing there, waiting for her share, it seems.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're being so sneaky, thinking their mom won't notice.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But with the sink overflowing like that, I don't think she's paying attention to much else.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope they hurry up and get down before they fall and hurt themselves.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a bit funny, though, how focused they are on those cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Kids will be kids, I suppose.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I just hope they don't make too much of a mess.
segments.speaker: PAR
